item.description: Publications 2023 Theresa Elstner, Frank Loebe, Yamen Ajjour, Christopher Akiki, Alexander Bondarenko, Maik Fröbe, Lukas Gienapp, Nikolay Kolyada, Janis Mohr, Stephan Sandfuchs, Matti Wiegmann, Jörg Frochte, Nicola Ferro, Sven Hofmann, Benno Stein, Matthias Hagen, and Martin Potthast. Shared Tasks as Tutorials: A Methodical Approach. In: Thirteenth AAAI Symposium on Educational Advances in Artificial Intelligence (EAAI 23), 2023. EAAI. Jan Heinrich Reimer, Sebastian Schmidt, Maik Fröbe, Lukas Gienapp, Harrisen Scells, Benno Stein, Matthias Hagen, and Martin Potthast.
